pages.text: The Alchemical Imbuer is a machine that brews potions. Creates $(l:thermal:technology/potion_fluid)potion fluid$(/l) as opposed to brewing directly in a bottle. One ingredient is enough to brew one potion bucket, which can fill 4 bottles.

pages.title: Augment Compatibility
